packagegui.name: sargschedule
packagegui.title: Status: Sarg Schedules

field.description: Enter a description for this schedule.

Enter Sarg extra arguments to run on this schedule.
To force Sarg to create a report only for specific days, use:

TODAY:  -d `date +%d/%m/%Y`
YESTERDAY:  -d `date -v-1d +%d/%m/%Y`
WEEKAGO:  -d `date -v-1w +%d/%m/%Y`-`date -v-1d +%d/%m/%Y`
MONTHAGO:  -d `date -v-1m +01/%m/%Y`-`date -v-1m +31/%m/%Y`

How often should this report be updated.
Valid options are: minutes(m), hours(h), days(d)
Example: To update every hour, use 1h
Enable this option to compress Sarg HTML report files using gzip. Reduces reports size.

To speed up find process, restrict search to report files created/changed specified number of minutes ago.
If your reports take long time to be created, increase this value.
Default: 60 (minutes).
